metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13286 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Xpdf 4.01.01, there is a heap-based buffer over-read in the function JBIG2Stream::readTextRegionSeg() located at JBIG2Stream.cc. It can, for example, be triggered by sending a crafted PDF document to the pdftoppm tool. It might allow an attacker to cause Information Disclosure.

notes.Note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 mdeslaur> poppler has extra checks, reproducer didn't work ebarretto> since 0.5.12-1 libextractor does not use xpdf anymore. xpdf in Debian uses poppler, which is not affected or fixed

criterions.comment: xpdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
